message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This price reflects the product's value to you and allows for a fair deal for both of us.  Let's find a solution that works for both parties.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can't go any lower than $1,000,000. This is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. It's a fair price for both of us. If you're not able to meet this price, I may need to consider other options.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Let's see if we can make a deal.
